EmailTemplate.description: Remind BWOC about outstanding customer contract
EmailTemplate.name: BWOC - Outstanding Contract
EmailTemplate.subject: Outstanding DocuSign Contract - {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear BWOC, An opportunity has an outstanding docusign contract that has not been signed in the past week. Please reach out to our channel partner and the opportunity to assist in finalizing the contract.
Thanks, BlueWave Customer Care
